00019 struct SVec2
00020 {
00021         SVec2() : x( 0 ), y( 0 ) { }
00022         SVec2( float x, float y ) : x( x ), y( y ) { }
00023         SVec2( const MVec2& v );
00024 
00025         void    Min( const SVec2& v )                                                   {       x = ::Min( x, v.x ); y = ::Min( y, v.y );               }
00026         void    Max( const SVec2& v )                                                   {       x = ::Max( x, v.x ); y = ::Max( y, v.y );               }
00027 
00028         void    Min3( const SVec2& v1, const SVec2& v2 )                {       x = ::Min( x, ::Min( v1.x, v2.x ) );    y = ::Min( y, ::Min( v1.y, v2.y ) );    }
00029         void    Max3( const SVec2& v1, const SVec2& v2 )                {       x = ::Max( x, ::Max( v1.x, v2.x ) );    y = ::Max( y, ::Max( v1.y, v2.y ) );    }

00031         float   Normalize();

00033         float   InvMag() const;

00035         float   MagSqr() const                                                                  {       return x * x + y * y;                                                   }

00045         SVec2   operator - ( const SVec2& v ) const                             {       return SVec2( x-v.x, y-v.y );                                   }

00069 struct SVec3
00070 {
00071         SVec3() : x( 0 ), y( 0 ), z( 0 ) { }
00072         SVec3( float x, float y, float z ) : x( x ), y( y ), z( z ) { }
00073         SVec3( const MVec3& vec );
00074 
00075         float                   Dist( const SVec3& vec ) const                  {       return Sqrt( DistSqr( vec ) );                                                  }
00076         inline float    DistSqr( const SVec3& vec ) const;
00077 
00078         float                   Mag() const                                                             {       return Sqrt( MagSqr() );                                                                }
00079         float                   MagSqr() const                                                  {       return x*x+y*y+z*z;                                                                             }
00080 
00081         float                   Dot( const SVec3& vec ) const                   {       return x*vec.x + y*vec.y + z*vec.z;                                             }
00082         float                   Dot( const MVec3& vec ) const                   {       return x*vec.GetX() + y*vec.GetY() + z*vec.GetZ();              }
00083 
00084         float                   AbsMax() const                                                  {       return Max( Abs( x ), Max( Abs( y ), Abs( z ) ) );              }

00120         union

00122                 struct

00131 inline SVec3 operator * ( float s, const SVec3& v )     {       return SVec3( s*v.x, s*v.y, s*v.z );                                    }

00133 //----------------------------------------------------------
00134 inline float
00135 SVec3::DistSqr( const SVec3& vec ) const
00136 {
00137         float dx = x - vec.x;
00138         float dy = y - vec.y;
00139         float dz = z - vec.z;
00140         return dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz;
00141 }
00142 
00143 //----------------------------------------------------------
00144 inline void
00145 SVec3::Normalize()
00146 {
00148         B_ASSERT( 
00149                 !ApproxEqual( x, 0.0f, FLT_EPSILON ) ||
00150                 !ApproxEqual( y, 0.0f, FLT_EPSILON ) ||
00151                 !ApproxEqual( z, 0.0f, FLT_EPSILON ) );
00152 
00154         float invMag = 1.0f / Mag();
00155         x *= invMag;
00156         y *= invMag;
00157         z *= invMag;
00158 }
00159 
00160 //----------------------------------------------------------
00161 inline SVec3
00162 SVec3::Normalized() const
00163 {
00165         B_ASSERT( MagSqr() > 0.00001f );
00166 
00168         float invMag = 1.0f / Mag();
00169         return SVec3( x*invMag, y*invMag, z*invMag );
00170 }
00171 
00172 //----------------------------------------------------------
00173 inline void
00174 SVec3::NormalizeFast()
00175 {
00176         float invMag = InvSqrtFast( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00177         x *= invMag;
00178         y *= invMag;
00179         z *= invMag;
00180 }
00181 
00182 //----------------------------------------------------------
00183 inline SVec3
00184 SVec3::NormalizedFast() const
00185 {
00186         float invMag = InvSqrtFast( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00187         return SVec3( x*invMag, y*invMag, z*invMag );
00188 }

00196 struct SVec4
00197 {
00198         SVec4() : x( 0 ), y( 0 ), z( 0 ), w( 1 ) { }
00199         SVec4( float x, float y, float z, float w ) : x( x ), y( y ), z( z ), w( w ) { }
00200         SVec4( const MVec4& v ) : x( v.GetX() ), y( v.GetY() ), z( v.GetZ() ), w( v.GetW() ) { }
00201 
00202         inline SVec4& operator += ( const SVec4& rhs )
00203         {
00204                 x += rhs.x; y += rhs.y; z += rhs.z; w += rhs.w;
00205                 return *this;
00206         }
00207 
00208         inline SVec4& operator = ( const SVec3& rhs )
00209         {
00210                 x = rhs.x; y = rhs.y; z = rhs.z; w = 1.0f;
00211                 return *this;
00212         }
00213 
00214         inline SVec4& operator = ( const SVec4& rhs )
00215         {
00216                 x = rhs.x; y = rhs.y; z = rhs.z; w = rhs.w;
00217                 return *this;
00218         }
00219 
00220         inline SVec4& operator = ( const MVec4& rhs )
00221         {
00222                 x = rhs.GetX(); y = rhs.GetY(); z = rhs.GetZ(); w = rhs.GetW();
00223                 return *this;
00224         }
00225 
00226         inline float operator [] ( int idx ) const { return *(float*)this; }
00227         inline float& operator [] ( int idx ) { return *(float*)this; }
00228 
00229         inline float Dot( const SVec4& v ) const                {       return x*v.x + y*v.y + z*v.z + v.w*w;   }
00230         inline float Dot( const SVec3& v ) const                {       return x*v.x + y*v.y + z*v.z + w;               }
00231 
00232         inline SVec4 operator - ( const SVec4& rhs )
00233         {
00234                 return SVec4( x - rhs.x, y - rhs.y, z - rhs.z, w - rhs.w );
00235         }
00236 
00237         inline SVec4& operator -= ( const SVec4& rhs )
00238         {
00239                 x -= rhs.x;
00240                 y -= rhs.y;
00241                 z -= rhs.z;
00242                 w -= rhs.w;
00243                 return *this;
00244         }
00245 
00246         float x;
00247         float y;
00248         float z;
00249         float w;
00250 };
00251 
00252 inline SVec4 operator * ( float scale, const SVec4& vec )
00253 {
00254         return SVec4( scale * vec.x, scale * vec.y, scale * vec.z, scale * vec.w );
00255 }
